=================================
Welcome to hello's documentation!
=================================

This project serves mainly as an example project for the
**Python developer tools**


Simple use
----------

Bla Bla

For the impatient
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
For the impatient: here's a quick overview of how to use this project.
Normally, all you have to do is import nad run, like this::

  import hello
  a = hello.index(2,3)
  print(a)

For the patient
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This will genarate a new web server...

You can also do this::

  from hello import index as ss
  print(ss(2,3))

For more information about how to use this library see the :ref:`api`.

- The classes
